description.lang: The Powerley Energy Bridge is the first and only gateway to provide both real-time energy management and smart home automation. Through Powerley technology, the Energy Bridge maintains a constant connection to real-time energy usage data via either a smart meter or other energy metering device. Through this connection, users can see exactly how much energy their home, and every appliance within it, are using via the Powerley mobile app. The Energy Bridge also serves as a smart home hub, providing users with control of their energy via control of the home through smart devices. Designed for ultimate flexibility, the Energy Bridge can connect to virtually any smart device providing a single-solution to control the entire smart home.
